# MDZZ

> Free online image tools for everyone. Process images locally in your browser with AI technology.

MDZZ is a collection of free, browser-based image processing tools. All processing happens locally on your device, ensuring maximum privacy and security.

## Core Features

- **100% Free**: All tools are completely free with no hidden costs
- **100% Local Processing**: All image processing happens in your browser, no server uploads
- **No Registration Required**: Use tools instantly without creating an account
- **Privacy First**: Your images never leave your device

## Available Tools

### Watermark Remover
- **URL**: /tools/watermark-remover
- **Description**: Remove watermarks, logos, text, and unwanted objects from images using AI technology
- **Features**:
  - AI-powered object removal
  - Support for various image formats
  - Local processing for privacy
  - Free unlimited usage

## Pages

- /: Homepage - Overview of all available tools
- /tools/watermark-remover: Watermark Remover Tool
- /privacy: Privacy Policy
- /terms: Terms of Service
- /cookies: Cookie Policy
- /login: User Login
- /register: User Registration
- /dashboard: User Dashboard (requires authentication)

## Technical Stack

- Frontend: React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Vite
- Backend: Go (Echo framework), GORM
- Authentication: Session-based auth
- Deployment: Cloudflare Pages (frontend), Docker (backend)

## Contact

For questions or support, please visit our website.
